entries.help_tree:
All registered Map Locations are displayed here.

Your Waypoints are also included.

Select a Category or Subcategory to display a group of Map Locations on the Map to the left.  Select a single Map Location to view it by itself.

You can right-click Map Locations in this display for a popup menu that will allow you to manage your Waypoints.
entries.help_zoom:
This is the Map Zoom Slider.

Use it to Zoom the Map view in or out.
entries.help_map:
This is the Planetary Map.

You can use it to find Locations and manage your Waypoints.

Right-click on the map for a popup menu that will allow you to create, destroy, rename, and activate Waypoints.
entries.tooltip_map:
Click and drag to pan the map.
Double click to zoom toward click point.
Right click on a location or the map to edit waypoints.
